column1: Cannot afford the direct costs of education
column3: There is a lack of interest for formal education
column4: Education is not a priority either for the child or the household
column5: There is a lack of interest/Education is not a priority either for the child or the household
column6: Lack of appropriate and accessible school
column7: No school in the area or school is too far
column8: School does not have enough classrooms that are usable
column9: School's water, sanitation or handwashing facilities are in poor condition or not available
column10: School has been closed due to conflict
column11: School has been closed due to natural disaster
column12: School has been closed due to damage, natural disaster, conflict
column13: School being occupied by armed forces/non-state armed groups
column14: School being hit by munitions/burning or theft/looting
column15: School used to host displaced people
column16: Lack of or poor quality of teachers
column17: Curriculum and/or the certificates issued by school are not perceived to be useful for the household
column18: Protection/safety risks while commuting to school
column20: Child needs to work at home or on the household's own farm, i.e. is not earning an income for these activities, but may allow other family members to earn an income
column21: Child participating in income generating activities outside of the home
column22: Child is associated with armed forces or armed groups
column26: Personal or family responsibilities, for female
column27: Physical constraints to the facilities especially for persons with disability, building not accessible, transport not accessible, too far, etc./Personel not trained or equipped to support persons with disabilities
column28: The child's disability or other health issues prevent them from accessing school
column29: The child's disability prevent them from accessing school
column30: The child's health issues prevent them from accessing school
column31: Unable to enroll in school due to lack of documentation
column32: Unable to enroll in school due to recent displacement/return,displacement since after the start of the school year
column33: Discrimination or stigmatization of the child for any reason
column34: The child has already graduated from secondary education
column36: Unavailability of menstrual hygiene supplies and facilities in schools
column37: There is a ban preventing child from attending
column38: There is a limitation preventing the child from attending
column39: The child has already completed compulsory school grades
column40: Lack of quiet and safe space to attend or listen to online learning classes
column41: Lack of appropriate IT equipment (laptop, tablet, etc)
column42: Lack of other school supplies (notebook, pencil, textbooks, etc. )
column43: Internet connection of bad quality  or no internet connection
column44: Unable to enrol in school due to lack of enrolment space
column45: Inadequate or damaged infrastructure for learning in a safe environment (e.g. damaged school facilities, no or inadequate bomb shelter)
column46: No education programmes available in the community/camp
column47: Not enough food for the family and school does not provide school feeding
column48: Forced return from abroad interrupted their school year
column49: Differentiations and community perceptions affecting participation
